org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event.flower

Class FlowerPollenEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event.Event
      • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event.flower.FlowerEvent
        • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event.flower.FlowerPollenEvent

  • public class FlowerPollenEvent
extends FlowerEvent
    Class to represent the event when a flower gains pollen. A flower usually gains pollen when it grows
